column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So disappointed!  After hearing a bunch of reviews about how this is THE place for deep dish pizza in Chicago
column2: I was really let down.  Maybe because it was overly hyped and I expected too much.  We tried the Lou (fresh spinach
column3: mushrooms and sliced tomatoes covered with a blend of mozzarella
column4: romano and cheddar cheese) and the Deluxe (Cheese
column7: onions and green peppers).  I felt the pizzas were sort of watery and I couldn't quite figure out what was wrong.  I think the flavors just weren't strong enough?  We did spring for the buttercrust which was pretty good - I usually never eat the crust
